snippet: The Mexican club Puebla declined to release DaMarcus Beasley and Michael Orozco to the United States national team for Wednesday’s friendly against Mexico.
lead_paragraph: The Mexican club Puebla declined to release DaMarcus Beasley and Michael Orozco to the United States national team for Wednesday’s friendly against Mexico.

headline.main: Countdown to 2014 World Cup, Day 73: U.S. Down Two Against Mexico
